Why is this now public? The commit log
```
- make public that it is accessible via gCling object during the Cling
runtime.
```
says that it's made accessible to make it accessible ;-) Can you give a reason? Testing / ...

I made it public to get information from device interpreter instance during runtime. For example, which arguments are set, like include paths, optimization level etc. I wanted the same like `gCling->getOptions().CompilerOpts.Remaining;` for the device compiler. 

In future, I also plan to give access to the ptx code (GPU assembler code) for each transaction.
